!ConEmu implements extended console feature. This is new in Far Manager 3.x and !ConEmu. When !ExtendedConsole.dll (!ExtendedConsole64.dll) located in Far.exe folder, and checkbox [Settings#Colors Colorer TrueMod support] is turned on - console program acquires 16M colors for text drawing and bold/italic/underline type faces.
